argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ax-icn | |- _i e. CC |
| 2 |  | #P_2cn | |- 2 e. CC |
| 3 |  | #P_picn | |- _pi e. CC |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_mulcli | |- ( 2 x. _pi ) e. CC |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_mulcli | |- ( _i x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) e. CC |
| 6 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( K e. ZZ -> K e. CC ) |
| 7 |  | #P_mulcl | |- ( ( ( _i x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) e. CC /\ K e. CC ) -> ( ( _i x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) x. K ) e. CC ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_sylancr | |- ( K e. ZZ -> ( ( _i x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) x. K ) e. CC ) |
| 9 |  | #P_efadd | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ ( ( _i x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) x. K ) e. CC ) -> ( exp ` ( A + ( ( _i x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) x. K ) ) ) = ( ( exp ` A ) x. ( exp ` ( ( _i x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) x. K ) ) ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( exp ` ( A + ( ( _i x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) x. K ) ) ) = ( ( exp ` A ) x. ( exp ` ( ( _i x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) x. K ) ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_ef2kpi | |- ( K e. ZZ -> ( exp ` ( ( _i x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) x. K ) ) = 1 ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( K e. ZZ -> ( ( exp ` A ) x. ( exp ` ( ( _i x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) x. K ) ) ) = ( ( exp ` A ) x. 1 ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_efcl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( exp ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_mulid1d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( exp ` A ) x. 1 ) = ( exp ` A ) ) |
| 15 | 12, 14 | #P_sylan9eqr | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( ( exp ` A ) x. ( exp ` ( ( _i x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) x. K ) ) ) = ( exp ` A ) ) |
| 16 | 10, 15 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( exp ` ( A + ( ( _i x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) x. K ) ) ) = ( exp ` A ) ) |
